alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:23PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ferry County through 500 PM PDT... At 422 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles east of Nespelem Community, or 46 miles east of Omak, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Ferry County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
